metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento antiviral en pacientes con brote agudo de colitis ulcerosa e infección colónica por citomegalovirus.
[Antiviral treatment of patients with acute outbreak of ulcerative colitis and colonic infection caused by cytomegalovirus].
